DOC.detailed_description: Fifty five ( 55 ) type 1 IDDM subject three center use MiniMed paradigm insulin pump , meet inclusion/exclusion criterion outline provide write Informed Consent enrol study . The study do subject randomize one two procedure sequence . Each subject undergo 3 procedure ( two clamp InsuPatch one clamp without InsuPatch ) thus serve his/her control . The 55 subject randomize one sequence . The order procedure select randomly perform within one month . There six Device visit start screen randomization visit , 3 clamp completion visit .
